summary: Comprehensive testing of Production Module (Servicios, Personas, Movimientos de Producción) completed. All 27 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI for Servicios, Personas, and Movimientos integration in RegistroForm working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/servicios-produccion - List all services (sorted by secuencia)
Backend: POST /api/servicios-produccion - Create new service
Backend: PUT /api/servicios-produccion/{id} - Update service
Backend: DELETE /api/servicios-produccion/{id} - Delete service
Backend: DELETE nonexistent servicio returns 404
Backend: GET /api/personas-produccion - List all personas with servicios_nombres
Backend: GET /api/personas-produccion?servicio_id=X - Filter by service
Backend: GET /api/personas-produccion?activo=true - Filter by active status
Backend: POST /api/personas-produccion - Create persona with multiple services
Backend: PUT /api/personas-produccion/{id} - Update persona
Backend: Toggle persona activo status
Backend: DELETE /api/personas-produccion/{id} - Delete persona
Backend: GET /api/movimientos-produccion - List all movimientos with details
Backend: GET /api/movimientos-produccion?registro_id=X - Filter by registro
Backend: POST /api/movimientos-produccion - Create movimiento
Backend: POST movimiento with invalid registro returns 404
Backend: POST movimiento with invalid servicio returns 404
Backend: POST movimiento with invalid persona returns 404
Backend: POST movimiento with persona without servicio returns 400
Backend: PUT /api/movimientos-produccion/{id} - Update movimiento
Backend: DELETE /api/movimientos-produccion/{id} - Delete movimiento
Backend: DELETE nonexistent movimiento returns 404
Backend: Full workflow integration test (servicio -> persona -> movimiento)
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Maestros' section with Servicios and Personas links
Frontend: /maestros/servicios page loads with services table (Corte, Costura)
Frontend: Create service dialog works with nombre and secuencia fields
Frontend: /maestros/personas page loads with personas table
Frontend: Personas show service badges (Corte, Costura)
Frontend: Filter buttons (Todos, Activos, Inactivos) work
Frontend: Create persona dialog with service checkboxes works
Frontend: RegistroForm shows 'Movimientos de Producción' section
Frontend: Existing movimiento displayed in table (Corte - Juan Pérez - 100)
Frontend: Create movimiento dialog opens correctly
Frontend: Persona dropdown disabled until servicio selected
Frontend: Persona dropdown filters by selected servicio
Frontend: Movimiento form fields (fecha_inicio, fecha_fin, cantidad, observaciones) work
seed_data_creation: Test data created by main agent: Servicio Corte (id: 18dcc520-0e9f-41e6-bdaf-928da9911884), Servicio Costura (id: 7e21bd03-e1a3-40e9-9a77-e67876bfdf39), Persona Juan Pérez (id: 512643ec-1d00-4bab-a6b9-df630004b986) with both services, Movimiento test (Corte - Juan Pérez - 100 prendas) linked to registro CORTE-TEST-001
context_for_next_testing_agent: Production Module fully tested. Three new entities: ServicioProduccion (name, sequence), PersonaProduccion (name, servicio_ids[], telefono, activo), MovimientoProduccion (registro_id, servicio_id, persona_id, fecha_inicio, fecha_fin, cantidad, observaciones). Key validation: persona must have servicio_id in their servicio_ids array to create movimiento. Frontend filtering works: selecting servicio filters personas dropdown. All CRUD operations working for all three entities.

servicios_produccion.ui: /maestros/servicios page with table and create/edit dialog

personas_produccion.filtering: Filter by servicio_id and activo status
personas_produccion.multiple_services: Persona can have multiple services assigned
personas_produccion.ui: /maestros/personas page with table, filter buttons, and create/edit dialog

movimientos_produccion.validation: Validates registro, servicio, persona exist and persona has servicio assigned
movimientos_produccion.ui: Integrated in RegistroForm with table and create dialog
movimientos_produccion.persona_filtering: Persona dropdown filters by selected servicio
